survey_name: Customer Satisfaction Survey for Electric Vehicle Charging Stations
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from users of electric vehicle (EV) charging stations to understand their satisfaction levels, identify pain points, and improve service quality.

questions.question_text: How often do you use public EV charging stations?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice question to categorize frequency of usage. Ensure options are mutually exclusive and cover all possible scenarios.

script.question_text: How often do you use public EV charging stations?

questions.question_text: Which types of EV charging stations do you typically use?
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections as users may utilize different types of charging stations. Include an 'Other' option for flexibility.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (MULTI_CHOICE). Include a text field for 'Other' if selected.

script.question_text: Which types of EV charging stations do you typically use?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the availability of EV charging stations in your area?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure satisfaction. Ensure the scale is balanced and includes a neutral option.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the availability of EV charging stations in your area?

questions.question_text: What challenges have you faced when using public EV charging stations?
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture all potential challenges. Include an 'Other' option for additional feedback.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (MULTI_CHOICE). Include a text field for 'Other' if selected.

script.question_text: What challenges have you faced when using public EV charging stations?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend this EV charging station network to others?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure likelihood of recommendation. This is a key metric for customer satisfaction (Net Promoter Score).

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend this EV charging station network to others?

questions.question_text: Please share any additional comments or suggestions for improving EV charging station services.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback. Ensure the response box is large enough for detailed comments.

script.question_text: Please share any additional comments or suggestions for improving EV charging station services.
